TopicTitle: Valentina's side business: McDuna Land Cruiser monster truck restaurant!

Articles.Content:
I decided our gallant new kerbonauts should have something to do between spaceflights - today I was thinking about food related subjects and few KSP players to date have tackled the problem/opportunity of setting up commercial food establishments to feed all the hungry scientists working overnight.

I also recently stumbled upon an awfully cute mod with 2.5m burger (!!!) modules. No seriously, it's called the [Burger Mod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94648-0-90-Burger-Mod%21-0-2-%282014-10-21%29) and everyone should download it right meow! 

Without further ado, I used my newfound Kerbal Truck Simulator specialized knowhow to construct a rolling chassis strong enough to support a restaurant on wheels. And not just any wheels, tomato and onion wheels! 

Full album on imgur: 

[http://imgur.com/a/WeXSx](http://imgur.com/a/WeXSx)
